name: Fairfield Inn Albany East Greenbush

reviews.text: Not much decor to the room, but the bed was comfortable, the high speed wireless internet was free, the front desk was friendly and efficient, and everything in the room was clean and in working order. There is a continental breakfast in the lobby in the morning.
reviews.title: Good hotel

aka: Fairfield Inn Albany East Greenbush Hotel
description: The Fairfield Inn by Marriott Albany-East Greenbush is minutes from Albany, New York's historic state capital as well as the Empire State Plaza, Times Union Center & Palace Theater. Albany International Airport is an easy 20 minute drive. Conveniently located minutes from RPI, HVCC, and Siena Colleges. Close to local corporations in Rensselaer Tech Park, as well as Regeneron, NYISO, and Pitney Bowes. Less than an hour away, many entertainment options can be found in Saratoga Springs, the Berkshires, Grafton State Park, Catskill Mountains, and Lebanon Valley Speedway. Local shopping is close by at Crossgates Mall, Colonie Center, downtown Troy and Lee Prime Outlets in Lee, MA. Enjoy complimentary wireless internet access in our bright, spacious guestrooms as well daily housekeeping and access to Planet Fitness. The Fairfield Inn by Marriott Albany-East Greenbush hopes you enjoy our complimentary hot and cold Continental Breakfast with healthy options, waffles, whole fruit and more!
